mapper.select:
select m.manager_id,m.manager_name,d.dept_name from manager m left join dept d on m.dept_no = d.dept_no
where m.manager_name like concat('%',#{managerName},'%')
mapper.insert: insert into manager (manager_name,dept_no) values (#{managerName},(select dept_no from dept where dept_name = #{deptName}))
mapper.update: update manager set manager_name = #{managerName},dept_no = (select dept_no from dept where dept_name = #{deptName}) where manager_id = #{managerId}
